article_title: Medicaid expansion is now law in Montana – but still many steps before it becomes reality
article_text:

article_metadata.author:
MIKE DENNISON
IR State Bureau

og.description: Now that Medicaid expansion is law in Montana, the real work of making it happen begins -- and state health officials said Wednesday it certainly won’t happen overnight.
og.title: Medicaid expansion is now law in Montana – but still many steps before it becomes reality
